meanings.definition: To take up and practice or use
meanings.sent1: She is adopting a new hobby of painting.
meanings.sent2: The company is adopting a more eco-friendly approach.
meanings.sent3: He thought about adopting a healthier lifestyle but ended up eating a whole cake.
meanings.sent4: The team is adopting a winning mentality for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent5: By adopting a positive attitude, she was able to overcome any obstacle.

meanings.definition: To take into one's family through legal means
meanings.sent1: The couple is adopting a child from an orphanage.
meanings.sent2: They are in the process of adopting a baby girl.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to surprise their dog by adopting a kitten.
meanings.sent4: The orphanage is like a bridge that connects children with families adopting them.
meanings.sent5: By adopting a pet, you not only gain a companion but also save a life.

meanings.definition: To choose or take as one's own
meanings.sent1: She is adopting a new fashion style.
meanings.sent2: He is adopting a more relaxed approach to life.
meanings.sent3: The idea of adopting a new catchphrase seemed amusing to him.
meanings.sent4: By adopting a positive mindset, he was able to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent5: The company is adopting a new logo to represent its brand identity.
